articles.title: "Black Panther: Wakanda Forever" crushes the box office on release - Africanews English
articles.description: "Black Panther: Wakanda Forever," the sequel to the Afro-futuristic Marvel film that bombed in 2018, has largely dominated the North American box office in its first weekend in theatres, according to figures Sunday from trade firm Exhibitor Relations.
